dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in October 2024, President Tokayev of Kazakhstan and the Armenian president held talks in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in October twenty twenty four, President Tokayev of Kazakhstan and the Armenian president held talks in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In October 2024, the presidents of Kazakhstan and Armenia held talks in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and now we're seeing that parliamentary diplomacy is really picking up—the Speaker of Armenia's National Assembly, Alen Simonyan, just visited Akorda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and now we're seeing that parliamentary diplomacy is really picking up-the Speaker of Armenia's National Assembly, Alen Simonyan, just visited Akorda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan met with the Speaker of the National Assembly of Armenia, Alen Simonyan, according to a statement from Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Tokayev called Armenia a reliable partner in the South Caucasus, which is uh, pretty significant given the regional dynamics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Tokayev called Armenia a reliable partner in the South Caucasus, which is uh, pretty significant given the regional dynamics.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev stressed that Armenia is a reliable partner for Kazakhstan in the South Caucasus region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And he emphasized how legislative bodies can offer comprehensive support to deepen cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And he emphasized how legislative bodies can offer comprehensive support to deepen cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Welcoming the Armenian parliamentary speaker, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev emphasized that the visit is significant for deepening bilateral cooperation, particularly in terms of comprehensive support from the legislative bodies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Simonyan seemed grateful too—he thanked Kazakhstan for the warm welcome and stressed building trust-based political partnerships.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Simonyan seemed grateful too-he thanked Kazakhstan for the warm welcome and stressed building trust-based political partnerships.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alen Simonyan expressed sincere gratitude to the President and the people of Kazakhstan for the warm welcome. He highlighted the importance of building trust-based political partnerships and strengthening interparliamentary cooperation as a key element of the bilateral dialogue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he specifically mentioned wanting to expand trade and economic ties, like increasing mutual trade volume through practical measures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he specifically mentioned wanting to expand trade and economic ties, like increasing mutual trade volume through practical measures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Speaker of the National Assembly expressed Armenia's interest in actively expanding cooperation with Kazakhstan in the trade and economic sphere. He emphasized the need for practical measures aimed at increasing mutual trade volume.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a concrete goal. And it sounds like both sides are really committed to developing relations across the board—trade, culture, humanitarian work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a concrete goal. And it sounds like both sides are really committed to developing relations across the board-trade, culture, humanitarian work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the President, Kazakh-Armenian relations are steadily progressing in many areas, supported by regular political dialogue and the expansion of trade, economic, cultural, and humanitarian ties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They also touched on regional peace—Simonyan thanked Kazakhstan for its efforts between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They also touched on regional peace-Simonyan thanked Kazakhstan for its efforts between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On this occasion, the Armenian side also thanked Kazakhstan for its efforts aimed at achieving peace between Armenia and Azerbaijan," the Akorda press service noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense, 'cause Tokayev had previously welcomed progress on a peace agreement between Yerevan and Baku.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense, 'cause Tokayev had previously welcomed progress on a peace agreement between Yerevan and Baku.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In March 2025, Tokayev also received Armenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan, noting that Kazakhstan welcomes the conclusion of negotiations on a draft peace agreement and the establishment of interstate relations between Yerevan and Baku.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He sees it as a milestone for not just those two countries, but for security and cooperation across Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He sees it as a milestone for not just those two countries, but for security and cooperation across Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, this milestone will mark the beginning of lasting peace between Armenia and Azerbaijan and contribute to regional security and active cooperation, both with Kazakhstan and with all countries of Central Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how Kazakhstan positions itself as this stabilizing partner in the region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how Kazakhstan positions itself as this stabilizing partner in the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Tokayev has been consistent—back in March 2025, he also met with Armenia's Foreign Minister, Ararat Mirzoyan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And Tokayev has been consistent-back in March twenty twenty five, he also met with Armenia's Foreign Minister, Ararat Mirzoyan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In March 2025, Tokayev also received Armenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan, noting that Kazakhstan welcomes the conclusion of negotiations on a draft peace agreement and the establishment of interstate relations between Yerevan and Baku.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So these high-level meetings really do seem frequent, which he says forms a solid foundation for the partnership.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So these high-level meetings really do seem frequent, which he says forms a solid foundation for the partnership.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We place great importance on our regular high-level meetings, which form the solid foundation of the Kazakh-Armenian partnership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And there's a cultural dimension too—he mentioned shared history and genuine warmth between the peoples.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And there's a cultural dimension too-he mentioned shared history and genuine warmth between the peoples.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our nations are united by strong bonds of friendship, shared history, and common cultural and humanitarian values, Tokayev previously emphasized.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you think this isn't just political; there's a real sense of friendship there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you think this isn't just political; there's a real sense of friendship there.
